ComicInfo.Title: The Mad King of Drakulon; A Game of Hide and Seek; Mystery of the Strangled Stockbroker; The Pharoah's Lady; ... But First, This Brief Interruption; Goodbye, Norma Jean
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Mad King of Drakulon: Vampirella couldn't pass up the opportunity to revisit Drakulon! With Mother, Starpatch and Crouchback, they began a flight which brought them to the land of ruby rivers. They arrived too soon!
A Game of Hide and Seek: The terms of Coron's will were explicit: to inherit Eric Coron's vast fortune, the principals merely had to murder Mr. Coron. There was a birzarre twist, of course. While they hunted him, he would be hunting them.
Mystery of the Strangled Stockbroker: On August 24 at 12:02 a.m. the murder of wealthy stockbroker Valentine P. Harlequin was reported to Detective-Inspector Ramona Shepherd. The log listed five people. Each had a motive to kill.
The Pharoah's Lady: The commoner, Isisi, had an opportunity few Egyptian girls had...to become a handmaiden to the queen and favorite of the Pharoah. But the ambitious wench wanted more...immortality!
... But First, This Brief Interruption: When a man is close to suicide he takes what chances happen his way. That's why the riddle game was so attractive to Larry. When he answered a riddle it meant riches...but the last riddle was a killer!
Goodbye, Norma Jean: Norma lived a very normal life as a spoiled only child until the intrusive birth of her beautiful younger sister. Then began a life of horror for the sisters, caught in a situation with no hope of escape!
